output.sentences: Everyone was excited to let of some steam after a long week.
The couple enjoyed their free time together, despite their friend's antics.
They were still happy after spending the past few years together.
It helped that they had many of the same friends to spend time with.
Like Jared and Tony who are the go to photographers at these get togethers.
